/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11    CMakeFiles/base_controller.dir/src/base_controller.cpp.o  -o /home/yangpc/workspace/DJI2016_Challenge_v1.0/devel/lib/m100_base_controller/base_controller -rdynamic /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libactionlib.so /home/yangpc/workspace/DJI2016_Challenge_v1.0/devel/lib/libdji_sdk_lib.a /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libroscpp.so -lboost_signals -lboost_filesystem /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole_log4cxx.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librosconsole_backend_interface.so -llog4cxx -lboost_regex /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libroscpp_serialization.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/librostime.so -lboost_date_time /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libcpp_common.so -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lpthread -lconsole_bridge -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/indigo/lib
